description.en: Professional code quality inspection and security audit
description.zh: Professional code quality inspection and security audit
description.ja: Professional code quality inspection and security audit

longDescription.en: This is a professional code review agent that can analyze your code for quality issues, security vulnerabilities, and best practices. It supports multiple programming languages and provides detailed feedback.
